description: This file defines the 'ThunderUtils' class, providing static utility methods for interacting with Thunder services, such as retrieving service states and creating Thunder controller clients. It includes necessary headers, macro definitions, and uses namespaces related to WPEFramework.

classes.name: ThunderUtils
classes.description: A utility class offering static methods to query service states and instantiate Thunder controller clients.

methods.name: uint32_t getServiceState(PluginHost::IShell * shell,const string & callsign,PluginHost::IShell::state & state)
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a specified service by its callsign using the provided shell interface.

methods.name: std::shared_ptr<WPEFramework::JSONRPC::LinkType<WPEFramework::Core::JSON::IElement>> getThunderControllerClient(std::string callsign="")
methods.description: Creates and returns a shared pointer to a Thunder controller client, optionally specifying a callsign.

ctags.name: getServiceState
ctags.pattern: /^    static uint32_t getServiceState(PluginHost::IShell* shell, const string& callsign, PluginHos/
